short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds some extra features for Wolt

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds three important features to Wolt:
1. Shows nutritional values on each dish (this is an estimation only based on the dish name, details and picture, and real values might be incredibly different). 
2. Adds a notes icon on each restaurant where you can write notes to yourself about this restaurant (for example - "They always forget the bread!" or "Not a good restaurant, you've tried it a few times in the past"). 
3. Removes the rating bubble after ordering a dish (but keeps the delivery tracking of course). 

The extension was tested on Hebrew and English menus only.
